title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 95.8 - Subpoenas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 95.8 - Subpoenas

State Regulations

The commissioner or any person designated by him for the purpose may issue subpoenas and administer oaths in connection with any investigation or hearing conducted under section
206-a
of the Public Health Law and shall issue subpoenas at the request of and in behalf of a party. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
95.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
